problem.p: If x and y are integers, then the expression 4 x + 5 y has a value that is odd or even depending on the values of x and y. For example, if x and y are each even, 4 x is even and 5 y is even. Therefore, 4 x + 5 y is also even.
For each of the blank rows in the table, indicate whether the value of 4 x + 5 y is odd or even.
